title: Dynamics of prey prehension by chameleons through viscous adhesion
title_cn: 变色龙通过黏附力捕获猎物的动力学
abstract: Among predators using an adhesive tongue to feed, chameleons are able to capture large prey by projecting the tongue at high acceleration. Once in contact with a prey, the tongue retracts with a comparable acceleration to bring it to the mouth. A strong adhesion between the tongue tip and the prey is therefore required during the retraction phase to ensure a successful capture. To investigate the mechanism responsible for this strong bond, the viscosity of the mucus produced at the chameleon’s tongue pad is measured, using the viscous drag exerted on rolling beads by a thin layer of mucus. Here we show that the viscosity of this secretion is about 400 times larger than that of human saliva. We incorporate this viscosity into a dynamical model for viscous adhesion, which describes the motion of the compliant tongue and the prey during the retraction phase. The variation of the maximum prey size with respect to the chameleon body length is derived, and compared with in vivo observations for various chameleon species. Our study shows that the size of the captured prey is not limited by viscous adhesion, owing to the high mucus viscosity and large contact area between the prey and the tongue.
abstract_cn: 在使用粘性舌头进食的食肉动物中，变色龙可以通过以高加速度伸出舌头来捕获大型猎物。一旦与猎物接触，舌头就会以相当的加速度缩回以将其带到嘴里。因此，在缩回阶段，舌尖与猎物之间需要牢固的附着力，以确保成功捕获。为了研究造成这种强力结合的机理，利用变薄的粘液层施加在滚动珠子上的粘性阻力，测量了变色龙舌垫上产生的粘液的粘度。在这里，我们证明了这种分泌物的粘度是人类唾液粘度的约400倍。我们将此粘度纳入粘性粘附的动力学模型中，该模型描述了缩回阶段顺应性舌头和猎物的运动。得出最大的猎物大小相对于变色龙体长的变化，并与各种变色龙物种的体内观察结果进行比较。我们的研究表明，由于粘液粘度高且猎物与舌头之间的接触面积大，因此捕获的猎物的大小不受粘性粘附的限制。

title: Topological semimetals with helicoid surface states
title_cn: 具有螺旋表面态的拓扑半金属
abstract: We show that the surface dispersions of topological semimetals map to helicoidal structures, where the bulk nodal points project to the branch points of the helicoids whose equal-energy contours are Fermi arcs. This mapping is demonstrated in the recently discovered Weyl semimetals and leads us to predict new types of topological semimetals, whose surface states are represented by double- and quad-helicoid surfaces. Each helicoid or multi-helicoid is shown to be the non-compact Riemann surface representing a multi-valued holomorphic function (generating function). The intersection of multiple helicoids, or the branch cut of the generating function, appears on high-symmetry lines in the surface Brillouin zone, where surface states are guaranteed to be doubly degenerate by a glide reflection symmetry. We predict the heterostructure superlattice [(SrIrO3)2(CaIrO3)2] to be a topological semimetal with double-helicoid surface states.
abstract_cn: 我们表明，拓扑半金属的表面弥散度映射为螺旋结构，其中本体结点投影到等能量轮廓为费米弧的螺旋体的分支点。 这种映射在最近发现的Weyl半金属中得到了证明，它使我们能够预测新型的拓扑半金属，其表面状态由双螺旋和四螺旋表面表示。 每个螺旋或多螺旋都显示为非紧致的黎曼曲面，代表了多值全纯函数（生成函数）。 多个螺旋线的交点或生成函数的分支切口出现在布里渊区表面的高对称线上，其中滑移反射对称性确保表面状态被双重退化。 我们预测异质结构超晶格[（SrIrO 3 ） 2 （CaIrO 3 ） 2 ]是拓扑半金属 具有双螺旋状表面状态。

title: Physical realization of a quantum spin liquid based on a complex frustration mechanism
title_cn: 基于复杂挫折机理的量子自旋液体的物理实现
abstract: Unlike conventional magnets where the magnetic moments are partially or completely static in the ground state, in a quantum spin liquid they remain in collective motion down to the lowest temperatures. The importance of this state is that it is coherent and highly entangled without breaking local symmetries. In the case of magnets with isotropic interactions, spin-liquid behaviour is sought in simple lattices with antiferromagnetic interactions that favour antiparallel alignments of the magnetic moments and are incompatible with the lattice geometries. Despite an extensive search, experimental realizations remain very few. Here we investigate the novel, unexplored magnet Ca10Cr7O28, which has a complex Hamiltonian consisting of several different isotropic interactions and where the ferromagnetic couplings are stronger than the antiferromagnetic ones. We show both experimentally and theoretically that it displays all the features expected of a quantum spin liquid. Thus spin-liquid behaviour in isotropic magnets is not restricted to the simple idealized models currently investigated, but can be compatible with complex structures and ferromagnetic interactions.
abstract_cn: 与常规磁体不同，常规磁体的磁矩在基态中部分或完全静止，而在量子自旋液体中，它们保持集体运动直至最低温度。此状态的重要性在于它是连贯的且高度纠缠的，并且不会破坏局部对称性。在具有各向同性相互作用的磁体的情况下，在具有反铁磁相互作用的简单晶格中寻找自旋-液体行为，这有利于磁矩的反平行排列并且与晶格几何形状不兼容。尽管进行了广泛的搜索，但实验实现仍然很少。在这里，我们研究了一种新颖的，未经探索的磁体Ca 10 Cr 7 O 28 ，该磁体具有复杂的哈密顿量，由多个不同的各向同性相互作用组成，并且铁磁耦合器比反铁磁耦合器强。我们在实验和理论上都表明它显示出了量子自旋液体的所有预期特征。因此，各向同性磁体中的自旋液体行为不仅限于当前研究的简单理想化模型，而且可以与复杂的结构和铁磁相互作用兼容。

title: Imaging chiral symmetry breaking from Kekulé bond order in graphene
title_cn: 成像手性对称性打破石墨烯中的Kekulé键顺序
abstract: Chirality—or ‘handedness’—is a symmetry property crucial to fields as diverse as biology, chemistry and high-energy physics. In graphene, chiral symmetry emerges naturally as a consequence of the carbon honeycomb lattice. This symmetry can be broken by interactions that couple electrons with opposite momenta in graphene. Here we directly visualize the formation of Kekulé bond order, one such phase of broken chiral symmetry, in an ultraflat graphene sheet grown epitaxially on a copper substrate. We show that its origin lies in the interactions between individual vacancies in the copper substrate that are mediated electronically by the graphene. We show that this interaction causes the bonds in graphene to distort, creating a phase with broken chiral symmetry. The Kekulé ordering is robust at ambient temperature and atmospheric conditions, indicating that intercalated atoms may be harnessed to drive graphene and other two-dimensional materials towards electronically desirable and exotic collective phases.
abstract_cn: 对称性或对称性是对生物学，化学和高能物理等领域至关重要的对称属性。在石墨烯中，由于碳蜂窝晶格，自然会出现手性对称性。这种对称性可以通过将电子与石墨烯中相反动量耦合的相互作用来破坏。在这里，我们直接可视化Kekul＆＃233;的形成。在铜基板上外延生长的超平石墨烯片中，键合顺序（一种破坏手征对称性的相）。我们表明，其起源在于通过石墨烯电子介导的铜基质中各个空位之间的相互作用。我们表明，这种相互作用会导致石墨烯中的键变形，从而形成具有破坏的手性对称性的相。 Kekul＆＃233;在环境温度和大气条件下，这种有序的鲁棒性很强，表明可以利用嵌入的原子来驱动石墨烯和其他二维材料向电子上理想的奇异集体相发展。

title: Observation of quantum Hawking radiation and its entanglement in an analogue black hole
title_cn: 模拟黑洞中的量子霍金辐射及其纠缠的观察
abstract: We observe spontaneous Hawking radiation, stimulated by quantum vacuum fluctuations, emanating from an analogue black hole in an atomic Bose–Einstein condensate. Correlations are observed between the Hawking particles outside the black hole and the partner particles inside. These correlations indicate an approximately thermal distribution of Hawking radiation. We find that the high-energy pairs are entangled, while the low-energy pairs are not, within the reasonable assumption that excitations with different frequencies are not correlated. The entanglement verifies the quantum nature of the Hawking radiation. The results are consistent with a driven oscillation experiment and a numerical simulation.
abstract_cn: 我们观察到由原子Bose爱因斯坦凝聚物中的模拟黑洞发出的，受量子真空波动激发的自发霍金辐射。 在黑洞外的霍金粒子与内在的伙伴粒子之间观察到相关性。 这些相互关系表明霍金辐射的近似热分布。 我们发现，在合理假设不同频率的激发不相关的情况下，高能对是纠缠的，而低能对却没有。 纠缠验证了霍金辐射的量子性质。 计算结果与驱动振动实验和数值模拟结果吻合。

title: Liquid explosions induced by X-ray laser pulses
title_cn: X射线激光脉冲引起的液体爆炸
abstract: Explosions are spectacular and intriguing phenomena that expose the dynamics of matter under extreme conditions. We investigated, using time-resolved imaging, explosions induced by ultraintense X-ray laser pulses in water drops and jets. Our observations revealed an explosive vaporization followed by high-velocity interacting flows of liquid and vapour, and by the generation of shock trains in the liquid jets. These flows are different from those previously observed in laser ablation, owing to a simpler spatial pattern of X-ray absorption. We show that the explosion dynamics in our experiments is consistent with a redistribution of absorbed energy, mediated by a pressure or shock wave in the liquid, and we model the effects of explosions, including their adverse impact on X-ray laser experiments. X-ray laser explosions have predictable dynamics that may prove useful for controlling the state of pure liquids over broad energy scales and timescales, and for triggering pressure-sensitive molecular dynamics in solutions.
abstract_cn: 爆炸是壮观而有趣的现象，它们暴露了极端条件下物质的动态。我们使用时间分辨成像研究了水滴和喷射流中超强X射线激光脉冲引起的爆炸。我们的观察表明，爆炸性的汽化作用是紧接着液体和蒸气的高速相互作用，并在液体射流中产生冲击波。由于X射线吸收的空间图案较简单，这些流量与先前在激光烧蚀中观察到的流量不同。我们表明，实验中的爆炸动力学与液体中压力或冲击波介导的吸收能的重新分布是一致的，并且我们对爆炸的影响进行建模，包括爆炸对X射线激光实验的不利影响。 X射线激光爆炸具有可预测的动力学特性，对于在较宽的能量范围和时间范围内控制纯液体的状态，以及在溶液中触发压敏分子动力学，可能被证明有用。

title: Time reversal and holography with spacetime transformations
abstract: Wave control is usually performed by spatially engineering the properties of a medium. Because time and space play similar roles in wave propagation, manipulating time boundaries provides a complementary approach. Here, we experimentally demonstrate the relevance of this concept by introducing instantaneous time mirrors. We show with water waves that a sudden change of the effective gravity generates time-reversed waves that refocus at the source. We generalize this concept for all kinds of waves, introducing a universal framework which explains the effect of any time disruption on wave propagation. We show that sudden changes of the medium properties generate instant wave sources that emerge instantaneously from the entire space at the time disruption. The time-reversed waves originate from these ‘Cauchy sources’, which are the counterpart of Huygens virtual sources on a time boundary. It allows us to revisit the holographic method and introduce a new approach for wave control.
abstract_cn: 通常通过对介质的属性进行空间工程设计来执行波控制。由于时间和空间在波传播中起着相似的作用，因此操纵时间边界提供了一种补充方法。在这里，我们通过引入瞬时时间镜来实验性地证明该概念的相关性。我们用水波显示有效重力的突然变化会产生时间反转的波，这些波会重新聚焦在源头上。我们将这个概念推广到所有类型的波中，引入一个通用框架，该框架解释了任何时间中断对波传播的影响。我们表明，介质特性的突然变化会产生瞬时波源，这些瞬时波源会在中断时从整个空间瞬时出现。时间反转波源自这些“ Cauchy源”，它们是在时间边界上的惠更斯虚拟源的对应物。它使我们能够重新审视全息方法，并引入一种新的波控制方法。

title: Explaining the dynamics of the ultra-relativistic third Van Allen radiation belt
title_cn: 解释超相对论的第三范艾伦辐射带的动力学
abstract: Since the discovery of the Van Allen radiation belts over 50 years ago, an explanation for their complete dynamics has remained elusive. Especially challenging is understanding the recently discovered ultra-relativistic third electron radiation belt. Current theory asserts that loss in the heart of the outer belt, essential to the formation of the third belt, must be controlled by high-frequency plasma wave–particle scattering into the atmosphere, via whistler mode chorus, plasmaspheric hiss, or electromagnetic ion cyclotron waves. However, this has failed to accurately reproduce the third belt. Using a data-driven, time-dependent specification of ultra-low-frequency (ULF) waves we show for the first time how the third radiation belt is established as a simple, elegant consequence of storm-time extremely fast outward ULF wave transport. High-frequency wave–particle scattering loss into the atmosphere is not needed in this case. When rapid ULF wave transport coupled to a dynamic boundary is accurately specified, the sensitive dynamics controlling the enigmatic ultra-relativistic third radiation belt are naturally explained.
abstract_cn: 自从50年前发现Van＆＃160; Allen辐射带以来，对其完整动力的解释一直难以捉摸。了解最近发现的超相对论第三电子辐射带尤其具有挑战性。当前的理论认为，外带心脏的损失对于第三条带的形成必不可少，必须通过高频等离子波来控制，该粒子通过吹口哨合唱，等离子球嘶嘶声或电磁波散布到大气中离子回旋波。然而，这未能准确地再现第三带。我们使用数据驱动的，与时间有关的超低频（ULF）波规范，首次展示了如何建立第三条辐射带，这是风暴时间极快的向外ULF波传输的简单而优雅的结果。在这种情况下，不需要将高频波散射到大气中。当精确地确定了与动态边界耦合的快速ULF波传输时，自然会解释控制神秘的超相对论第三辐射带的敏感动力学。
